summary: Completed comprehensive testing of F1 Fast Lap Challenge System with major UI updates. All new features tested successfully including 3-line customizable title with color pickers, transparent leaderboard entries, track image display, admin-only export functionality, password change, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.issue: Modal overlay occasionally intercepts clicks, requiring force=True for reliable interaction
design_issues.workaround: Direct API testing confirms functionality works correctly

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity (46/46 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Public page shows customizable title (3 lines: TEST FAST LAP UPDATED with red/green/blue colors)
Status banner positioned UNDER the title/header showing event and track info
Admin button positioned IN the header (top right, not floating)
NO export buttons on public page (confirmed 0 export buttons found)
All leaderboard entries have transparent/glass effect (entry-transparent class)
Track card displays image when image_url is set (Silverstone track image loads successfully)
Default login works with admin/admin credentials
Password change functionality in admin settings (tested via API)
Title customization with 3 color picker inputs (red #FF0000, green #00FF00, blue #0000FF)
Track management with image URL field (https:// placeholder visible)
Event status settings dialog accessible
Export CSV/PDF buttons only in admin dashboard (protected endpoints)
Mobile responsive design (390x844 viewport tested successfully)
Logout functionality redirects to login page
Leaderboard ranking and gap calculations (Max 1st, Lewis +0.667, Charles +1.333)
Top 3 positions special styling (gold, silver, bronze rank badges)
Track information integration (status banner shows 'auf Silverstone, United Kingdom')
Real-time data updates and synchronization
German UI labels throughout application
Dark racing theme with F1-style design
Empty state display when no entries exist
Protected admin routes require JWT authentication
Public endpoints accessible without authentication
Site settings customization (title lines and colors)
Track creation with image URL support
Event management with track selection
